section.title: Overview
section.para: Database Programmers spend time on essential tables and schema elements significant to a specific application instead of rewriting common schema elements for each application. Sparx allows for re-use of Schemas across applications and produces and maintains Schema documentation. The entire schema is managed in XML as an XML document (a SchemaDoc) and SQL is generated through XSLT style sheets (the templates). The same SchemaDoc can be used to generate database-specific SQL DDL.
